title: Who's a 'New American'? Unpacking the phrase and its use in Vermont
description: This hour, host Mikaela Lefrak and guests explore the term “New American." Some say the phrase unites communities of refugees, asylum seekers and immigrants, while others see it as divisive, confusing, or worse.
